author: HemantMahawar
body: Short term solution for #951 as man (help) is a very basic on those distros. Also, needed for getting started on PowerShell commands.

comments.body: is anyone checking if we need to deliver different help content for Linux and OSX?

comments.body: @AngelCalvo I was just asking the same question on a different email thread. I will add you to the discussion.

title: Add current help maml files for Linux/OS-X builds
